title: 177: How to Solve the Trolley Problem
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: The Trolley problem presents a perfect study case from which to look at different ethical viewpoints. But . . . come on. You know you'd pull the lever. It's just the right thing to do.
itunes:author: A lever puller, a saint, and a leg puller
itunes:subtitle: You know you'd pull it too.
itunes:summary: The Trolley problem presents a perfect study case from which to look at different ethical viewpoints. But . . . come on. You know you'd pull the lever. It's just the right thing to do.
